title: Everything You Need to Know About Being an Ink Master Human Canvas

steps.title: Yes, you can apply online to be a canvas on Ink Master.
steps.content: Yes, you can apply online to be a canvas on Ink Master . Simply head to Ink Master ’s website and fill out an application with your name, number, and address. The application will ask you other questions, like how you would describe your personality and how many tattoos you have already. It will also ask you to describe the potential tattoo you’d like to receive and where on your body you’d want it. [1] X Research source To fill out an application, head to http://www.castinginkmaster.com/human-canvas-application.html . Be sure to read the application fully, including the terms and conditions near the bottom, before submitting. Ink Master only reviews applications when they’re getting ready to shoot a new season. If the show is not currently casting, wait until they are to submit your application.

steps.title: You must be over 18 and a Canada local.
steps.content: You must be over 18 and a Canada local. Ink Master is only allowed to tattoo legal adults, so you have to be over 18 by the time the show is filming. And, since Ink Master is based in Canada, you need to be a Canadian citizen in order to participate. [2] X Research source

steps.title: You must be vaccinated against COVID-19.
steps.content: You must be vaccinated against COVID-19. As of 2022, Ink Master is requiring all of its participants to be fully vaccinated. On the application, it will ask you if you’re vaccinated; and if you aren’t, it will ask you if you’re willing to be vaccinated if asked to participate. [3] X Research source If you are not vaccinated and not willing to get vaccinated before filming, you will not be selected as a canvas.

steps.title: No, Ink Master canvases don’t have to pay for their tattoos.
steps.content: No, Ink Master canvases don’t have to pay for their tattoos. If you are selected to be on Ink Master , you will not have to pay your tattoo artist nor the producers of the show for your tattoo. That’s the beauty of Ink Master —you get tattooed free of charge! [4] X Research source

steps.title: No, Ink Master canvases do not get paid for their time.
steps.content: No, Ink Master canvases do not get paid for their time. In the terms and conditions of the application, you’ll notice that human canvases do not get any monetary compensation. You will also not get reimbursed for any travel or accommodation costs that you have. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Yes, Ink Master was canceled in 2020, but is returning in 2022.
steps.content: Yes, Ink Master was canceled in 2020, but is returning in 2022. The production shut down in 2020 for multiple reasons, one of which was the COVID-19 pandemic. However, the show has been picked up again by Paramount+ to air a new season.
